updates.title: Anthropic projects massive revenue growth to $70B by 2028, signaling enterprise AI adoption acceleration that could reshape B2B software markets and funding expectations for AI startups throughout 2025.

OpenAI's Sora video generation app launches on Android following iOS release, indicating broader consumer rollout of AI video tools that could accelerate adoption among content creators and designers in coming weeks.

Major cloud infrastructure deals totaling over $60B between OpenAI-Amazon ($38B), Microsoft-Lambda, and Microsoft-IREN ($9.7B) suggest massive scaling of AI compute capacity ahead of expected model releases and enterprise deployments in 2025.

Amazon integrates Alexa Plus AI assistant into Music app and ClickUp launches enhanced AI features, indicating accelerated rollout of AI assistants across productivity and creative platforms throughout November.

Growing copyright tensions emerge as Studio Ghibli and Japanese publishers demand OpenAI stop training on their content, while Google faces defamation accusations over Gemma model outputs, potentially impacting AI model development and licensing deals in coming months.
